content: this is a free amigurumi pattern here you will find step-by-step instructions for crocheting your own korok from the game series the legend of zelda the pattern is a 9-page pdf file written in portuguese and english it contains detailed instructions with a lot of photos to help you along the project size 11cm high with a 2mm crochet hook 19cm high with a 3 5mm crochet hook difficulty beginner please note that this pattern is subject to copyright you can produce and sell as many items with this pattern as you wish but just the finished product you made no part of this document can be reproduced stored in a retrieval system or transmitted in any form or by any means don t forget how much effort i put into this pattern please respect my rights as a designer thank you so much and have fun crocheting
